title: ðŸ“¬ Mailbag: Evaluating the 2023 QB Draft Class, Did the 49ers make a mistake picking Trey Lance #3 overall? (Football 4/4)
description:
Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson and John Breech are back for another Monday Mailbag, answering YOUR questions! If you want your question to be answered on a future show, leave a question attached to a 5-star review on Apple Podcasts or come hang with us in our YouTube live chat! On this episode, the Pick Six Superfriends discuss the 49ers decision to draft Trey Lance at #3 last year and if that was the right move. They also look ahead to next year's QB class and analyze if it's worth waiting on a franchise QB.Â 

ï»¿'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â 
You can listen to Pick Six on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast."
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @johnbreech, @E_DeBerardinis
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
Visit the CBS Sports Store to buy Pick Six merch: https://store.cbssports.com/collections/pick-six
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Read the Pick Six newsletter here: https://www.cbssports.com/newsletters/picksix/
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/

They also look ahead to next year's QB class and analyze if it's worth waiting on a franchise QB.Â
